00017 #ifndef _FRED_TIMESTEP_MAP_H
00018 #define _FRED_TIMESTEP_MAP_H
00019 
00020 #include "Global.h"
00021 #include <stdio.h>
00022 #include <map>
00023 
00024 using namespace std;
00025 
00026 class Timestep_Map {
00027   // The Day Map class is an input structure to hold a list of values
00028   // that are indexed by timesteps, this is used for values that 
00029   // need to be changed on certain timesteps throughout the simulation
00030   // Based on David Galloway's initial seeding.
00031   
00032   // A Timestep_Map is to be specified in a seperate file
00033   // If a Timestep_Map is specified with [] on the end, it is assumed to
00034   // be disease specific 
00035   
00036   // This structure is designed so that if there is a specification in the 
00037   // input that specifies "none" as the keyword, the structure is empty.
00038   
00039   // The input keyword will be the name of the structure_file.  So if the
00040   // name of the Map is passed as "primary_cases", the param keyword will
00041   // be "primary_cases_file".
00042 
00043   // The format of the file is as such
00044   // 0 100
00045   // 1 0 
00046   //   Should be interpreted as 100 on timestep 0, 0 on timestep 1 and beyond
00047   //
00048   // 0 100
00049   // 100 0
00050   //   Should be interpreted as 100 for timestep 0 - 99, and 0 on timestep 100 and above
00051   // Updated: Shawn Brown
00052   
00053 public:
00054   Timestep_Map();  
00055   Timestep_Map(string _name);
00056   virtual ~Timestep_Map();
00057   
00058   // Utility Members
00059   int get_value_for_timestep(int ts, int offset); // returns the value for the given timestep - delay
00060   bool is_empty() const { return values->empty(); }
00061   virtual void print();
00062 
00063   virtual void read_map();
00064 
00065 protected:
00066   map <int, int>* values;  // Map structure that holds <ts, value>
00067   string name;             // Name of the map
00068   char map_file_name[255];
00069   int current_value;       // Holds the current value of th map.
00070 };
00071 
00072 #endif // _FRED_TIMESTEP_MAP_H
